entry.title: Camo Muay Thai Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Men - Bundles
Price: 89.95

* You can request different sizes for each item by leaving a note on the cart page.

The Camo Muay Thai Bundle includes the Camo Rash Guard in short sleeve and Camo Muay Thai Shorts.

The Camo Rash Guard shows off an intricate camouflage design and is the perfect workout compression shirt for men. Paired with durable Muay Thai shorts, this bundle is suitable for Muay Thai, Boxing, Kick Boxing, MMA, Sparring Fight and Grappling, Fitness Traning at Gym or Outdoor sport. 

Why XMARTIAL Bundle:

  • Anti-slip gel panel added technology for extra grip and keeping the rash guard from riding up.
  • Crafted with the finest fabrics to withstand the toughest training conditions. 
  • Moist-wicking technology to keep away sweats.
  • Fully sublimated graphics that won't crack, peel, or fade over time and maintain a great look. 
  • Breathable, stretchy and quick dry for maximum comfort. 
  • One-Year Warrantee, we stand behind our product quality.
  • 100% Money-Back Guarantee, risk free buy.

Boost your jiu-jitsu game with a compression shirt that complements your sense of style. Long and short sleeves are both available. Great for MMA and BJJ, surfing, watersports, and also for men's training.

  • Anti-slip gel panel added technology for extra grip and keeping the rash guard from riding up.
  • Crafted with the finest fabrics to withstand the toughest training conditions.

The Camo Muay Thai Shorts is a classic look for any sporting event. It features vivid colors and quality craftsmanship. With a traditional elastic waistband, these MMA shorts will stay well-positioned no matter how vigorous the training is. Convenient side slits mean these boxing shorts will allow you maximum movement. 

  • Ultimate comfort thanks to its ultra-lightweight and durable perfect stretch fabric
  • Fully sublimated graphics that will never crack, peel or fade
  • Optimized for the highest level of athletic performance in BJJ, MMA, catch wrestling, no-gi, and submission grappling.
